chart_description: The residual frequency chart shows the difference between the measured frequency and the ideal frequency, for the Chrony service. A positive residual frequency means the system is running slow, while a negative residual frequency means the system is running fast. This chart is important for monitoring time synchronization accuracy and detecting issues with the Chrony service.

dimension_descriptions.residual_frequency: The difference between the measured frequency and the ideal frequency, measured in parts per million (ppm). A positive value means the system is running slow, while a negative value means the system is running fast.
